column4: hey im setting up harddisk quota, following a tutorial with a single / partiton.... have a question though... the line  ext4    errors=remount-ro,usrjquota=aquota.user,grpjquota=aquota.group,jqfmt=vfsv0  0       1
refers ti my / partition what about my /home partition would i make it the same?
i don't know what the option jqfmt=vfsv0  is for?
